snippet: The results left further room for the Chinese government to continue heavy lending by the country’s state-owned banks.
abstract: Chinese government announces that inflation slowed further in October, leaving further room for it to continue heavy lending by the country’s state-owned banks to rekindle economic growth without stoking a broad increase in prices.
lead_paragraph: The results left further room for the Chinese government to continue heavy lending by the country’s state-owned banks.

headline.main: Consumer Price Inflation Slowed Last Month in China
headline.print_headline: Consumer Price Inflation Slowed Last Month in China
